title: S13 Ep72: Supernatural News/Parashare: Episode 162
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: Episode 162
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS is back with Supernatural News & a VERY powerful ParaShare segment that left your hosts in tears.

This week is filled with reports of Intergalactic Goddesses sent to Save the Earth, The Haunted Hand, Loch Ness offspring sighted in Australia and more!
Plus this week we read recent encounters with the Supernatural in a powerful segment that touched Dave & Tim and a story that is amazing, touching and heartbreaking.

Support the advertisers that support our show and save $$$!
